resources.string: This is the main activity of the app. Here you have access to the playlist, artists or store.
This is the list of the songs I downloaded to my phone. If I want more I go to Artists and search what song I want.
Here you choose an artist you would like to hear. Tapping on one artist will open a list with all his songs.
Here I can buy certain albums that are new and cannot be downloaded.

This activity plays each song you chose from playlist. I would like to use a progress bar too here. In order to build my app I will have to use the ContentResolver class to retrieve tracks on device, the MediaPlayer class and the MediaController class to control playback.
Choose which songs you like to add to your playlist. When you tap a song it will download to your playlist.
